abstract: Yahoo plans to announce it has opened up some of its key mobile software and services to outside publishers and programmers.
snippet: Yahoo plans to announce it has opened up some of its key mobile software and services to outside publishers and programmers.
lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO  There may not be a Yahoo phone in the works, but the struggling Internet company is betting that a new mobile-phone strategy will help it better compete with the likes of Google, Microsoft and others for a share of the growing cellphone advertising business.

headline.main: Yahoo Makes a New Play for Ads on Mobile Phones
headline.print_headline: Yahoo Makes a New Play For Ads on Mobile Phones

abstract: 1-800-Flowers.com is holding a “Will You Marry Me?” contest to find the season’s most intriguing marriage proposal.
snippet: 1-800-Flowers.com is holding a “Will You Marry Me?” contest to find the season’s most intriguing marriage proposal.
lead_paragraph: “ENGAGING the consumer” is a popular phrase in marketing, particularly as the public shifts its attention from television to interactive media like the Internet. This Valentine’s Day, engaging consumers  or getting consumers engaged  is precisely what the online floral retailer 1-800-Flowers.com aims to do.

headline.main: Saying ‘Will You’ for Prizes, on the Web
headline.print_headline: Saying ‘Will You’ for Prizes, on the Web

abstract: Even at an Internet company, information travels fastest on the ground.
snippet: Even at an Internet company, information travels fastest on the ground.
lead_paragraph: IT probably doesn’t come as a huge surprise to learn that while employees in many companies sit in the cafeteria gossiping about work, or the boss, or the competition, at Google they are doing something else.
